title: Frigobloc Monthly 2026 - Family Organization Calendar / Month (Sep 2025 to Dec 2026)
description:
FRIDGLOCK ©, CHOOSE THE ORIGINAL!  
FRIGOBLOC© is the number 1 magnetic family calendar in sales!  
Ideal for organising family life from September 2025 to December 2026.  
Thanks to its ultra-strong magnet, it fits on any fridge, even curved. This magnetic fridge calendar offers large, easy to fill boxes, perfect for jotting down appointments, activities, menus and holidays.  
It includes official dates of school holidays and many bonuses:

- Unpublished cooking recipes (express, light, for children or last minute guests),
- A detachable shopping list pad,
- Repositionable notes,
- Two schedules for children, a pencil with its elastic band,
- As well as practical sheets to facilitate everyday life (to-do list, useful numbers, mission table, calendar of events...).

Made with quality materials (160g thick paper, strong support, extra strong glue), FRIGOBLOC© is the essential tool for all families wishing to organize easily, without compromising on quality or price.

Organizing has never been easier!
